product-Hint: All products found are sourced from third-party platforms. Mulebuy only provides product search, purchasing agency, and shipping services. We do not verify or guarantee the quality or authenticity of the products.
product-offers: Mulebuy offers 3 to 7 high-definition quality inspection photos for free
product-after-sales-service-desc: The goods you purchase will be sent to the Mulebuy warehouse. Upon arrival at the warehouse, we will inspect and take photos of the items for you. You can view and manage the goods in the warehouse. If you are not satisfied with the goods after they arrive at the Mulebuy warehouse, you can apply for a return within 5 days. Our agent will negotiate with the seller on your behalf to handle after-sales issues. Each different item will be charged a handling fee of approximately 0.75 USD and shipping/return shipping fees, totaling about 3 USD for returns/exchanges.
product-after-sales-service-exchange-des: Return and exchange are not supported for customized products.
product-guidance-tl: Prohibited items such as tobacco, alcohol and so on cannot be transported.
product-guidance-it: Prohibited items' include but are not limited to:
product-guidance-ns: ·Swiss army knife, Kitchen knives set, Kitchen knife, The paper letter knives, Gardening knife/scissors/saw, Putty knife, Bamboo/wooden sword knife, knife CARDS/universal knife CARDS, other outdoor cutting tools, Swiss army knife, End mill, Burn, Knife,
product-guidance-ml: ·Pure fruit/vegetable juice, Wine, Cheese/western-style cheese, Crabs, etc
product-duidance-sw: ·Swiss army knife, Kitchen knives set, Kitchen knife, The paper letter knives, Gardening knife/scissors/saw, Putty knife, Bamboo/wooden sword knife, knife CARDS/universal knife CARDS, other outdoor cutting tools, Swiss army knife, End mill, Burn, Knife,
product-guidance-ri: Goods such as medicines, liquids, creams, powders and cosmetics are subject to China export shipping restrictions. To ensure a smooth shopping experience, we recommend you to contact [Customer Service] for confirmation before purchasing.
product-popup-remark-tips: Only fill this out if you have special requirements for this order
product-disabled-buy: Products submitted might have 1 risk(s), we suggest you read the risks and think before ordering
product-disabled-buy-content: We are very sorry that the product is suspected of infringement. We are unable to purchase it for you. If you have any questions, please contact us
product-inferior-seller-content: Sorry, we do not recommend purchasing the product for you because the seller has been involved in bad quality and after - sales service issues before. To protect your interests, it is recommended to use expert services to find similar products. Thank you for your support.
product-brand-products-content: PayPal payment is not available due to brand restrictions
